thread.title: Brooke Wehr Accuses Jeremy Calvert of Cheating With ‘Teen Mom 2’ Producer
thread.title_full: Brooke Wehr Accuses Jeremy Calvert of Cheating With ‘Teen Mom 2’ Producer

author: Ariana Romero
title: Brooke Wehr Accuses Jeremy Calvert of Cheating With ‘Teen Mom 2’ Producer
text:
February 21, 2017 by Ariana Romero 0 Shares Advertisement 
Jeremy Calvert is fighting cheating rumors once again. 
This time the shocking allegations come from the Teen Mom 2 dad’s on-again, off-again fiancée Brooke Wehr , who’s made some jaw-dropping claims on Instagram. Credit: Brooke Wehr on Instagram Credit: Brook Wehr on Instagram 
The Calvert-Wehr drama began when Brooke shared a meme reading, "Yes my love, I love you. I swear I won't cheat on you tonight," over the image of a side chick grinding on a shady teen boy, RadarOnline.com reports. 
The single mom’s caption dragged a TM2 producer into the infidelity accusations. Mandi (@mAnDi06) April 4, 2016 
"Sounds about right. Too bad he f****d the producer @mandi06," Brooke wrote below the now-deleted meme, tagging Chelsea Houska ’s field producer Mandi Venturino. 
Another ‘Gram posting reveals how, exactly, Leah Messer ’s ex-husband, 28, supposedly cheated on his latest love interest. Credit: Brooke Wehr on Instagram 
"You just talk to bitches for hours on end everyday until 2am," she captioned another critical meme before erasing the message. 
"Haha I don't know who the hell you think you're fooling, but you're a terrible liar." 
Somehow, the deception goes even further than this. Credit: Brooke Wehr on Instagram 
Brooke also alleged her husband-to-be listed a mistress as “Tim” in his phone to hide the other woman in plain sight, adding, “Guess Leah was right. I should have listened.” 
Despite all of these damning claims, Jeremy has yet to directly respond to any cheating speculation. 
Instead, he’s shared a few eyebrow-raising Instagram posts about single life. 
Keeping with the meme theme, the Adalynn’s dad shared one reading, “Single AF? D—k still big tho [sic].” 
Credit: Jeremy Calvert on Instagram 
At least Jeremy’s next upload hinting towards his apparent breakup is a little more family-friendly. 
On Sunday, February 19, Leah’s ex shared a sweet photo of Addie, writing, “The only girl i need in my life only thing she complains about is the wrong color bug juice lmao.” Credit: Jeremy Calvert on Instagram 
Although Jeremy is apparently too busy to deny any supposed infidelities, accused other woman Mandi is ready to do so. 
The MTV producer tweeted, “#Alternativefacts #fakenews have a lovely day everyone,” in response to the rumors. Credit: Mandy Venturino on Twitter 
Do you think Jeremy cheated on Brooke with Mandi? Tell us your theories in the comments section below! 
Teen Mom 2 airs Mondays at 9 p.m. ET on MTV.
